title: Orianna should get a "Courtney Gears" skin

embed.description: the ratchet and clank courtney gear song

body: {{champion:61}}  I would so kill if Riot gave Orianna a Courtney Gears skin called Popstar Orianna, I'd legit cry xD! It would be so amazing and it would also work, like make sense :D. {{champion:61}}

replies.body:
We'd need to have agent Clank to be floating around or in the ball if it was going to be made, go big or go home with the idea of this skin haha.
They pretty much used Sly Cooper for Twitch's robbery skin so why not jump to another PS Classic for Ori.
Riot, get to work on this now!

That would be amazing,
 think I will try to draw this concept :D

That would honestly be one of my favourite skins if they made it. Ratchet and Clank is one of my favourite series and a "Popstar Orianna" could match Ahri's so well. Especially if it had a reference to Courtney Gears.
And come to think of it, her battle theme sounds like really good music for playing Ori{{champion:61}}
A concept would be so cool! damn I love seeing Ratchet and Clank fans, especially from the older games :D
